column5: a 54 year old Korean man named  JOO GYE DONG came to the Phnom Penh Municipal Police Office ask for help to return to his country after he lost his passport.------It was discovered that he arrived in 2016 via the Poipet international checkpoint as a tourist and has no money or place to stay. On April 20 he went to Khmer-Soviet hospital for a COVID-19 test (negative result). He was referred to the Immigration Department. ------SOURCE
